summary: An Ordinance appropriating Seventy-five Dollars ($75.00), or so much thereof as may be necessary, from the General Fund of The City of Seattle, to Local Improvement Fund Condemnation Award District No. 3169, to meet a deficit in said Local Improvement Fund Condemnation Award District No. 3169, created by the cancellation, by the court, of a certain assessment in the assessment roll of Rainier Avenue Condemnation and judgment confirming the same, Ordinance No. 29364, Cause No. 87583, and declaring an emergency.
